description:
In this economics and finance course, you will learn about different types of Islamic financial markets and their key features and principles.

You will also learn about the challenges of Islamic financial and capital market development.

No previous knowledge is needed, but a basic knowledge of business concepts is advantageous.
title: IFCM101x: Islamic Finance and Capital Markets
instructors: Ahmed Iskanderani, Lotfi Zairi, Yahya Aleem ur Rehman, Khalifa M. Ali and Abdullahi Mohamed
